verbs.description: [ARG1: Condoleezza Rice] [V: stood] up [ARGM-PRP: for Kanye West 's right to express himself] [ARGM-LOC: amid a backlash against his recent comments about slavery and support of Trump] .
Condoleezza Rice stood up for Kanye West 's right to [V: express] [ARG1: himself] amid a backlash against his recent comments about slavery and support of Trump .
